structure.unit: A PLANNING AND OVERSIGHT OF GOVERNMENTAL FINANCE

law.text: The Public Pension Oversight Board of the Kentucky General Assembly is hereby established. The purpose of the board shall be to review, analyze, and provide oversight to the General Assembly on the benefits, administration, investments, funding, laws and administrative regulations, and legislation pertaining to the state-administered retirement systems.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2013.
